title: Large-scale VR-based Marine Ecosystem Simulation: Environmental Problem-solving Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic marine ecosystems, experience using VR devices
context.additional_context: A course focused on cultivating problem-solving skills for marine environmental issues using mathematical modeling, targeting job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structure and function of marine ecosystems with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners collect and interpret marine pollution data using VR environmental analysis tools, model it mathematically, and propose at least three solutions.
Learners perform marine protection policy simulations with over 90% engagement by sharing real-time data with team members in collaborative VR tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
